ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: internship
I reflected on my internship experience and how it connects to my academic journey back at Yale.
Reflections on summer internship, impact on Yale career and future studies
How to write essay
A good reflection on my summer internship and how it affects my academic life at Yale post-internship.
Reflection on summer internship experience.
The course helped me reflect on my summer internship experience.
good
Reflection on internship and further plans

I learned generally more about what it means to evaluate work experiences and the value in doing such reflection. My reflection gave me a lot of insight into how I have grown as a person and artist, as well as into what I would like to work on in the future.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: no weakness
No weaknesses. It's very chill and just a 7-8 page reflection paper on your summer. Just don't do it last minute.
Good course
The main strength is the free format of reflections on my summer experience.
good
Strengths are that is a great way to get credit for a summer experience and kind of force yourself to reflect in a way you otherwise might not.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: if you did a summer internship with CPT
Yes
You only ever take it if you're an international who needs to after a summer internship in the US.
Yeah perfect for me. Did what I jeeded
Don't take it unless you have to due to CPT.
Required if you are an international student who did a summer internship in the US on CPT.
Yes, I did it for CPT.
I mean, if you gotta take it, you gotta take it.
good

Yes, if you have a summer experience that was really significant to you and your journey either professionally or artistically/creatively, this is a great way to reflect while also getting credit for your work.
